alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Jackson; Oglala Lakota; Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 22 at 4:19PM MDT until April 22 at 5:15PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Oglala Lakota County in southwestern South Dakota... Southwestern Jackson County in southwestern South Dakota... Northwestern Bennett County in southwestern South Dakota... Southeastern Pennington County in west central South Dakota... * Until 515 PM MDT. * At 419 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Sharps Corner, or 24 miles north of Pine Ridge, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Satellite and lightning indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Kyle, Kyle North Route Housing, Potato Creek and Interior. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
